item.title: CVE-2024-32080|2024-04-11T08:41:25.161Z -- Nick Pelton -- Search Keyword Redirect
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Nick Pelton Search Keyword Redirect allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Search Keyword Redirect: from n/a through 1.0.
